titles.title: Recognizing and celebrating the centennial of the United States Navy Reserve.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
3/4/2015--Introduced. Recognizes the centennial of the Navy Reserve, its role as a component of the Armed Forces, and the role of Secretary of the Navy Josephus Daniels and future President Franklin D. Roosevelt in its establishment.
Honors the service of Navy Reserve members who protect the United States and commends their efforts in supporting the Navy, Marine Corps, and Joint Force.
